thread.title: Dynamic Positioning Systems Market by Equipment Type , Sub-
thread.title_full: Dynamic Positioning Systems Market by Equipment Type , Sub-

author: ReportBuyer
title: Dynamic Positioning Systems Market by Equipment Type , Sub-
text:
LONDON , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- This report on dynamic positioning systemsprovides a detailed analysis of the various applications and sub-segments that exists in the marketover the next five years. It contains a thoroughanalysis of the drivers, challenges, and restraints that affect the industry, along with their impact from the short-, medium-, and long-term perspectives landscapes. 

It also discusses the industry, market, and technology trends that currently prevail in the market. The report provides vital information on key trends related todynamic positioning systems. It is expected that a rising demand for merchant vessels and offshore vessels will shape and influence the DPSmarket. The report also analyzes the market with a special focus on IMO-specified DPS equipment types as well as the various applications of DP systems.

This report also highlights the industry value chain, supply chain,with a detailed PEST analysisand life cycle analysis of the dynamic positioning systems market. Another aspect which is elucidated is the illustrative segmentation, geographicalanalysis, and forecast of the major markets to provide an overall view of the global market.
Premium insights from industry experts are quoted in this report to provide a holistic view of this market.

A competitive landscape comprising theidentification of key players and their market shares has also been provided in the report. Strategic profiling of the key players in the dynamic positioning systemsmarket along with a comprehensive analysis of thelatest developments, key growth strategies, investments, and core competencies in each segment have been identified.

Key players profiled in the report includeGeneral Electric Company (U.S.), Kongsberg Gruppen ASA ( Norway ), Marine Technologies LLC (U.S.), AB Volvo Penta ( Sweden ), L-3 Communications Corporation (U.S.), Navis Engineering, Oy (Finland) , Rolls-Royce Plc (U.K.), Praxis Automation & Technology B.V. ( The Netherlands ), and Norr Systems Pte. Ltd. ( Singapore ).

The report exhibits an in-depth analysis of the dynamic positioning systems applications in this market, along with a detailed analysis of major countries from each region. It also exhibits the market share of DPS equipment types across various regions. 
It indicates the overview of the various sub-systems associated with DPS, such as thruster systems, power systems, DP control system, and sensors.
The report also specifies the key growth regions and countries for this market along with emerging trends and technologies.
Density Check: 3.08%
